# United Hydrogen

### Hydrogen Energy as a Service (H2aaS)

United Hydrogen is establishing a closed loop ecosystem from hydrogen supply to end-use energy consumption. We provide a one-stop service covering energy production, storage and transportation, infrastructure construction, business application, key equipment and carbon asset management. United Hydrogen plans to expand its global footprint into key countries and areas which regard green energy as a strategic resource. We lead, integrate and help our supply chain with cost efficiency and technological advancement, to export fine products as well as our Super Plant facility.
